fields.description:
{{EntityWrapper}} has been marked {{@Deprecated}} since {{2011-08-16 03:51:48 -0700 147}}.  That is enough.

h3. Litany of problems
* It is worth noting the relationship between types which use {{EntityWrapper}} and those which tend to be effected by HA failures.
* There are some glaring bugs to do with transaction management:
** {{com.eucalyptus.configurable.StaticDatabasePropertyEntry.update(String, String, String)}} will never close the transaction in the case of two errors -- such as would happen during a failover.
** {{com.eucalyptus.images.Images.enableImage(String)}} will never close the transaction in the case of a {{RuntimeException}} (or for that matter anything that is not conformant to {{EucalyptusCloudException}}).
** {{com.eucalyptus.entities.EntityWrapper.lookupAndClose(T)}} has the same problem and causes it to manifest through {{com.eucalyptus.images.Images.lookupImage(String)}}.

h4. Configurables Usages
{code}
com.eucalyptus.configurable.StaticDatabasePropertyEntry.update(String, String, String)
{code}

h4. Images Usages
{code}
com.eucalyptus.images.Images.enableImage(String)
com.eucalyptus.images.Images.listAllImages()
com.eucalyptus.images.Images.lookupImage(String)
{code}

comments.body:
We believe the storage stuff is all that's left.  
DNS needs to be checked by [~kedwards]
I added EUCA-8867 for the DNS and other minor usages of EntityWrapper and am currently working on it.

This issue was previously scheduled to be worked on in more than one sprint:
* '3.3 Sprint 4' (on board 'Test 3.3 Board')
* '3.3 Sprint 4' (on board 'Copy of 3.3 Release Board')

Starting from JIRA Agile 6.3, an issue can only belong to a single future sprint. Read more about this change: http://docs.atlassian.com/agile/docs-0640/Sprint+Marker+Migration

This issue is now scheduled for future sprint '3.3 Sprint 4' (on board 'Copy of 3.3 Release Board').

If this is incorrect, please update the issue accordingly.

This comment was automatically generated by JIRA. If it is no longer relevant, please feel free to delete it.
No issues found in manual or automated testing due to this fix.
